title: Quantum Cryptanalysis
description: We study and break post-quantum cryptographic primitives using quantum algorithms and adversarial models.

title: Quantum Compilation
description: We design low-level compilation pipelines for near-term quantum architectures and hybrid algorithms.

title: Algorithm Design
description: We develop novel quantum algorithms and improve the performance of known routines under realistic constraints.

title: Research Collaboration
description: We partner with universities and industry to write proposals, publish papers, and build new technologies.

title: Secure Computing
description: We contribute to secure-by-design post-quantum systems with attention to both theory and practical deployability.
